cjminecraft.core.crafting

Class RecipeClearColour

  • java.lang.Object
    • cjminecraft.core.crafting.RecipeClearColour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.item.crafting.IRecipe

    public class RecipeClearColour
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.minecraft.item.crafting.IRecipe
    Allows the colour tag to be cleared from coloured ItemStacks
